articles.title: Australia to host England at MCG in 150th anniversary of first Test match
articles.description: Australia plan to celebrate the 150th anniversary of the first-ever Test match by playing England at the Melbourne Cricket Ground in March 2027.
articles.content:
Australia plan to celebrate the 150th anniversary of the first-ever Test match by playing England at the same venue in March 2027.
The Melbourne Cricket Ground (MCG) played host to a single-innings … [+1861 chars]

articles.title: 50-year snub leaves stadium’s future in doubt
articles.description: Queensland Cricket bosses have demanded the state government commit to a stadia strategy after Cricket Australia confirmed the Gabba would not host a Test match during the 2026/27 summer.
articles.content:
Queensland Cricket bosses have demanded the state government commit to a stadia strategy after Cricket Australia confirmed the Gabba would not host a Test match during the 2026/27 summer.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
